content.rendered: My husband and I took a trip with you guys on Friday, June 11. We departed from your new outpost at Idaho Springs. The staff were wonderful – very knowledgeable and our group leader had a great sense of humor. I was a little skeptical about taking the trip – I am not so adventurous – but I am so glad that I went. I had the best time. I don't think I have smiled and laughed so much in years. I love that you guys had hot coffee and tea waiting for us upon our return – who knew the water would be so cold? I would definitely recommend you to anyone looking to have a great time white water rafting. I really hope we get to return to Colorado soon. Sincerely, Misty & Stephen Phillips
